cast.name: 查卢彭·提坤朋提拉翁 Chaleumpol Tikumpornteerawong

this_title: หลวงพี่เท่ง ๓ รุ่นฮาเขย่าโลก
introduction: Noi is a rock star who starts to feel bore within materialistic Thai society. He eventually finds the path to tranquility and peace by entering the monkhood. Now Noi is a young, self-confident, and stubborn monk who has to deal with many hilarious situations with his new companions. It seems like Noi can't really escape from his confusing rock star world after all.
foreign_title: หลวงพี่เท่ง ๓ รุ่นฮาเขย่าโลก
